description: A quiet, misty coastline where time seems to stand still. The water is unnaturally calm, reflecting only the present moment.
storyline: Perseus lives as 'Fisher'. After finding a rusted hook in a wreck, he begins to experience auditory hallucinations of a woman's lullaby, leading him to discover the chest of his exile.

visibility_conditions.items: The 'Hidden Names' remain encrypted until Perseus touches the Ark of Danae.
visibility_conditions.characters: Zeus (char_015) appears only as ambient 'Golden Rain' particles until Chapter 8.
visibility_conditions.environmental: The path to the Reefs is blocked by 'Memory Fog' until the Fisherman's Hook is equipped.

description: A dense, dark forest where the trees are petrified in poses of agony. The air smells of salt and old decay.
storyline: Perseus follows 'The Echo' to a coastal clearing. He must defeat the shadow of Cetus to prove he is more than a survivor, reclaiming his role as a protector.

visibility_conditions.characters: Andromeda (char_003) is semi-transparent and silent until Cetus is defeated.
visibility_conditions.items: The Aegis (item_002) is seen only as a 'Dull Lid' until the boss fight begins.
visibility_conditions.environmental: Hidden murals of Andromeda's sacrifice appear only when using the 'Mirror-Polished Lid' reflection.

description: A subterranean network where light does not exist. The walls echo with the overlapping voices of the past.
storyline: Perseus must navigate total darkness using sound. He tricks the three sisters to steal their eye, gaining the 'True Sight' needed to find the Gorgons.

visibility_conditions.environmental: All subareas are pitch black until the 'Milky Quartz Stone' (item_006) is obtained.
visibility_conditions.characters: The Weaver (char_002) is visible only in the peripheral vision of the player as a blur of silver.

description: A floating orchard bathed in a perpetual sunset. The gravity is weak, and the flora glows with divine ichor.
storyline: Perseus must prove his humility to the maidens. Hermes appears to test his speed against the North Wind, rewarding him with the tools of flight.

visibility_conditions.items: The Talaria (item_003) remain 'Tattered Sandals' until the player wins the race against Boreas.
visibility_conditions.environmental: The Golden Apples are invisible to those who harbor greed (Identity Gauge must be below 50%).

description: A volcanic mountain of obsidian and glass. Every surface is a mirror, forcing the hero to look at his own soul.
storyline: The psychological climax. Perseus fights a manifestation of Medusa. Victory is not through killing, but through the acceptance of his past trauma, leading to the birth of Pegasus.

visibility_conditions.characters: Pegasus (char_014) is invisible until the 'Medusa' boss phase 2.
visibility_conditions.items: The Severed Head (item_012) stays wrapped in burlap; opening it causes a 'Game Over' unless the Aegis is equipped.

area_name: The Hall of the Petrified King
description: A frozen palace in Argos. Hundreds of statues of the court remain in mid-motion, expressions of terror fixed in stone.
storyline: Perseus returns home to find his mother imprisoned by a memory of Polydectes. He must reclaim his title as Prince and confront the ghost of his grandfather.

visibility_conditions.characters: Danae (char_010) is hidden inside a 'Statue of Gold' until Polydectes (char_011) is defeated.
visibility_conditions.environmental: The Hall appears as a ruins until the 'Visage of the Strategist' (item_015) is worn.

description: A desolate peak where the sky meets the earth. The air is thin, and the stars are bright enough to burn.
storyline: Perseus climbs the Atlas Mountains. He realizes the 'Mountain' is a being he once cursed. He must offer a 'Memory of Mercy' to Atlas to pass the veil into the Titaness's realm.

visibility_conditions.characters: Atlas (char_005) is only visible as a face in the rock until the player reaches the summit.
visibility_conditions.environmental: The 'Astral Bridge' only appears if Perseus's 'Identity Gauge' is at 100%.

description: A void of liquid silver and floating memories. The physics of the world are broken here.
storyline: The final battle. Mnemosyne attempts to dissolve Perseus into a nameless ghost. He uses the full weight of his recovered life to anchor himself and shatter the Titaness's control over time.

visibility_conditions.all_assets: All 'Hidden Names' and 'Hidden Stats' are permanently revealed and maximized in this area.
visibility_conditions.characters: Glaucus (char_019) appears as a spectral child to provide the final healing 'Motherly Embrace'.
